snippet: Peekskill Project 6 is offering works by 56 artists at 20 sites, including large outdoor installations and paintings created on the walls of five private homes.
abstract: Sixth installment of Peekskill Project, public art festival organized by Hudson Valley Center for Contemporary Art, features works by 56 artists in 20 different sites (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: Peekskill Project 6 is offering works by 56 artists at 20 sites, including large outdoor installations and paintings created on the walls of five private homes.

headline.print_headline: A City as Canvas for Artists Near and Far
headline.main: Peekskill as Canvas for Artists Near and Far

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Hudson Valley Center for Contemporary Art
